name: Mr. Dice
description:
Mr. Dice is a person whose body is, well, a die that can switch between different faces from 1 to 6 🎲. Depending on which face you've chosen for him, his interactions with the environment can change pretty drastically.

Using the dice-switching mechanic to your advantage, navigate the level 🏃‍♂️, collect stars 🌟, and enter the portal 🚪 to advance the game!

Mr. Dice is a prototype, proof-of-concept game made in 48-hours. If you have feedback/suggestions, feel free to leave them here, I'd love to hear what you think about this game 😊.
